THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The visual shows a dramatic reduction in body fat (before/after) directly referencing the core theme of 'getting lean' from the title. The muscular individual next to the fat loss graphic is a strong visual argument for the video's premise.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: The thumbnail promises a rapid/decisive solution ('KILLS'), while the title is phrased more as an explanation ('Why 90% of People Never Get Lean') with an added call to action ('Do This Instead'). The thumbnail is more aggressive/direct than the informative/curious tone of the title, but both share the promise of fat loss.
